programme.title: Attitude
programme.desc:
Georgia Heard thought she had parenting all mapped out. But when the younger of her two boys was diagnosed with severe Autism at 15 months old, her journey took an unexpected turn.
Année : 2011

programme.title: Attitude
programme.desc:
Pieta Bouma was just 19 years old when she broke her back while living in Ecuador. Nearly two years on she's immersed in student life, finding new ways to enjoy old loves, and becoming a strong voice for the community.
Année : 2011

programme.title: Kelly & Ramya
programme.desc:
Kelly MacDonald, Ramya Amuthan and a team of blind and partially sighted contributors share arts, entertainment and lifestyle stories.
Année : 2011

programme.title: Les enquêtes de Murdoch
programme.desc:
(S06EP12) Detective Murdoch and his methods are compromised when one of his colleagues is implicated in a suspicious murder.
Année : 2008

programme.title: Double Tap TV
programme.desc:
(S05EP31) You've got questions and we, hopefully, have the answers. On this 'Ask Us Anything' episode of Double Tap TV, guest host Becki Zerr joins Steven Scott and Marc Aflalo to field questions from our audience.
Année : 2008

programme.title: Mind Your Own Business
programme.desc:
(S01EP06) Denise Justin started an accessible clothing brand when she started to lose her eyesight. The pandemic has slowed things down, and she's looking for advice to build her business.
Année : 2008

programme.title: L'appel du coeur
programme.desc:
(S01EP04) Evidence against Cat Montgomery is piling up and Jack has no choice but to arrest her for the burning of the church. Elizabeth takes care of the Montgomery children while Jack attempts to prove Cat's innocence.
Année : 2014

programme.title: By Hook or By Cook
programme.desc:
(S01EP05) Siblings Ishan and Shanaya were both born with Spinal Muscular Atrophy. The self-proclaimed "control freaks" want to get away from their repetitive day-to-day lives.
Année : 2014

programme.title: Les quatre sens
programme.desc:
(S02EP06) In this episode, food personality, cookbook author and food columnist Bonnie Stern shares her cooking knowledge and gets fruity in the kitchen with our Four Senses hosts.
Année : 2014

programme.title: Our Community
programme.desc:
(S05EP08) We profile Shane Baker's self advocacy to remedy accessibility barriers faced by students at Camosun College, as well as his work with Indigenous youth speaking to addiction, mental health, identity and the importance of culture.
Année : 2014

programme.title: Eyesoforst-l Job
programme.desc:

Année : 2014

programme.desc:

programme.title: NOW with Dave Brown
programme.desc:
Join Dave Brown as he discusses the latest news, sports, entertainment and current events through a disability lens.
Année : 2008

programme.title: Level Playing Field
programme.desc:
Paralympic hopeful Anthony Lue shows Greg Westlake a little positivity goes a long way, not only on the hand cycle, but in everyday life. And, we get in the ring with 67-year-old boxer Debbie Haryett.
Année : 2008

programme.title: #IGotThis
programme.desc:
(S04EP04) In this episode of #IGotThis: Lady issues. Meet a business owner, mom and wife who is learning to better appreciate life when endometriosis slows her down. And, meet a woman with pelvic pain who works double-time to keep her mind active and healthy.
Année : 2008

programme.title: L'appel du coeur
programme.desc:
